entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
